name: You vs Bot
description:
"You vs Bot" is a game with multiple mini levels/mechanics. Bot 47  is an annoying bot that won't tell u the controls of any level easily. U must figure out the controls in multiple games depending on the situation.

Right now I have added only 2 levels. Level 1 is classic the classic flappy bird which should not be difficult to surpass. Level 2 brings forth difficulty with multiple conditions to win and an enchanting environment.

Controls:

SpaceBar: to jump in flappy bird

LMB - Drag and Move mechanics

Enjoy and don't let Bot 47 win

Thanks for Playing
